hobbies.title: Video games
hobbies.bio: Video games have brought me immense joy over the years, serving as a means to socialize, relax, think, appreciate art, and even dive into map and 3D design.

hobbies.title: Walking
hobbies.bio: Walking helps me unwind after learning, keeping me active with minimal planning while benefiting my mental and physical health.

hobbies.title: Cooking
hobbies.bio: Cooking is a simple hobby that I can continuously improve on. It's beneficial for my health, wallet, and mind.

hobbies.title: Painting
hobbies.bio: Painting allows me to explore creativity on my own schedule, helping with design skills, creating color palettes, and planning for continuity.

hobbies.title: Drawing
hobbies.bio: Drawing simplifies my creative process, requiring just a pen and paper. It’s a step towards creating my own stories.

hobbies.title: Reading
hobbies.bio: A 2018 New Year's resolution that stuck, reading offers both relaxation and mental adventures through its simple yet complex content.

hobbies.title: Learning
hobbies.bio: I constantly seek to learn new things, ideally synergizing with my existing skills. My current focus is on coding and design for personal projects.

projects.title: Cat Game
projects.bio: My first project involved creating a cat game using DOM manipulation. It was messy but a great learning experience.

projects.title: Twitter Clone
projects.bio: My second project was a Twitter clone. It presented many challenges and was even messier than my first project.

projects.title: Facebook Clone
projects.bio: Creating a Facebook clone, I focused on a smaller feature list and learned from past mistakes, resulting in a much better project.

projects.title: Design projects
projects.bio: A project focused on design, helping me develop skills in creating color palettes and plans for continuity.

projects.title: E-Commerce
projects.bio: A collaborative project where I contributed to both front-end and back-end development, handling merge conflicts and getting the e-commerce site running.

projects.title: Massage therapy booker
projects.bio: Developed a massage therapy scheduler that also recommended stretches based on the user’s profile.

projects.title: Project 7
projects.bio: Designed a mobile-first coffee shop website with a dynamic column layout and icon-based navigation.

work.title: Janitor
work.bio: Worked in a team during the summer and autonomously during the semesters, handling tasks like creating floor plans, organizing moves, maintaining stock, and keeping the school clean.

work.title: Army
work.bio: Realized a dream by joining the army, where I helped with a natural disaster response, spent many nights in the forest, and focused on teamwork and equipment maintenance.

work.title: English Teacher
work.bio: Combined my skills in video editing, streaming, and teaching (TEFL certified) to work with a diverse group of students.

work.title: Web Developer
work.bio: Currently pursuing a dream career in web development, where I feel I can continually grow and never feel trapped. I also work on personal projects in my own time.
